title: Assasin rework
body:
Guys what do you think of the assasin rework? i mean i love to play as a assasin and i think it don't want a rework! What do you think about this?
{{champion:55}} {{champion:238}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: i want a bratwurst with Sauerkraut o.o sry this is the german board and if you want something from us write pls in our language or ask peopple in your language on your boards.

You may like playing Assasins, but some assasin are seen as "Unhealthy" because of them being just too over powered...

And they really do need a rework
